events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund based on their request for money back.
Assigning the case to a refund specialist to handle the refund request efficiently.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. Let's get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process the refund.
Here is my order number 987654321 and attached is a photo showing the incorrect product I got.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and you do not need to return the incorrect item.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick resolution and not having to send the item back.
Your refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, I got the refund today. Thanks again for the excellent support!
We are glad your issue has been resolved. Closing the case now. Thank you for contacting support.
